messages.content:
Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "Discussions also revolved around security, energy, and economic development for the benefit of citizens."
Rot-13 text:
Qvfphffvbaf nyfb eribyirq nebhaq frphevgl, raretl, naq rpbabzvp qrirybczrag sbe gur orarsvg bs pvgvmraf.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "That's our way of thinking and what we base our work on."
Rot-13 text:
Gung'f bhe jnl bs guvaxvat naq jung jr onfr bhe jbex ba.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "Soon after, he built academic and literary careers."
Rot-13 text:
Fbba nsgre, ur ohvyg npnqrzvp naq yvgrenel pnerref.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "No longer just a gentleman’s agreement, the co-management framework is a validation of the work of stakeholders both within and beyond the boundaries of parks."
Rot-13 text:
Ab ybatre whfg n tragyrzna’f nterrzrag, gur pb-znantrzrag senzrjbex vf n inyvqngvba bs gur jbex bs fgnxrubyqref obgu jvguva naq orlbaq gur obhaqnevrf bs cnexf.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "In 2022, the total trade turnover reached a historic high of USD 12.33 billion."
Rot-13 text:
Va 2022, gur gbgny genqr gheabire ernpurq n uvfgbevp uvtu bs HFQ 12.33 ovyyvba.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "Much as it does today, India consisted of many religions, ethnicities and languages."
Rot-13 text:
Zhpu nf vg qbrf gbqnl, Vaqvn pbafvfgrq bs znal eryvtvbaf, rguavpvgvrf naq ynathntrf.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "My generation of producers and I are now thinking of how to make the film practice sustainable."
Rot-13 text:
Zl trarengvba bs cebqhpref naq V ner abj guvaxvat bs ubj gb znxr gur svyz cenpgvpr fhfgnvanoyr.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "Communication and information sharing between people, the government, and society have been significantly impacted by AI and data optimisation technologies in politics."
Rot-13 text:
Pbzzhavpngvba naq vasbezngvba funevat orgjrra crbcyr, gur tbireazrag, naq fbpvrgl unir orra fvtavsvpnagyl vzcnpgrq ol NV naq qngn bcgvzvfngvba grpuabybtvrf va cbyvgvpf.

Rot-13 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 13 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-13.
Original text: "When we ran for office, we had no program and practically did not know what could be done."
Rot-13 text:
Jura jr ena sbe bssvpr, jr unq ab cebtenz naq cenpgvpnyyl qvq abg xabj jung pbhyq or qbar.
